material: steel with black matte powder coat
usage: pull down, press down, row, triceps, biceps & lats exercises on cable machines
key_features: EASILY ATTACH TO ANY CABLE MACHINE
Build stronger biceps, triceps, grip, lats, shoulders, and core
Superior construction with steel and black matte finish
Rust-protected black powder coat for longevity

ai_description: A black matte-finish cable machine attachment with a textured grip surface featuring two large circular hand holes. The handle has a sleek, modern design with silver metal components including a central U-bolt attachment point secured with a bolt. The product is shown both isolated on a white surface and in use, where a person grips it with both hands connected to a cable machine via a metal carabiner. The packaging highlights it as a universal attachment point that easily connects to any cable machine.
target_audience: home gym users and fitness enthusiasts seeking upper body strength training
product_name: KAKSS Cable Machine Attachments Narrow Bicep
